DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study examine efficacy safety continuous negative external pressure ( `` cNEP '' ) treatment chronic snore people without obstructive sleep apnea .
DOC.criteria: sleep test within previous six month show snore least 30 dB least 30 % total sleep time AHI < 10/hr previous neck surgery radiation carotid artery disease serious medical psychiatric illness pregnancy silicone allergy excessive use alcohol sedate drug
